text: It only takes me listening to a track from this game to get the instant feel of adventure and magic it provided. Jeremy Soule is a true master at conveying this kind of atmosphere. I'd be up for a new Elder Scrolls right now.
author: SupraDarky

text: couldnt agree more with this comment omg

text: This reminds me venturing across the Ascadian Isles Region in the night, peacefully scouring wickwheat and kresh fibers to increase my alchemy skill. The giant moon in the sky and violet splash of stars was truly euphoric. I'll never forget
author: Barret Wallace

text: BRAAAAAA memories and nostalgia omg love this comment
author: Leonhart

text: Morrowind the best ES
author: The Okayed Boomer

text: Soule’s work inspires me every time I hear something from him. It’s my dream to compose at least some sort of music at least once in my life. Simple yet impactful songs like these are just the thing that motivates me.
author: GenericYoutubeComment Channel

text: There is such a air of grandeur when listening to the music from the Elder Scrolls series.  I think Jeremy Soule is a very good composer who has mastered making scenic and beautiful songs.  Even though i have not played a game from this series, this song feels oddly nostalgic.
author: Eric C.

text: If you have a PC, or any of the last couple gens of consoles, pick up an elder scrolls game.  They're not perfect but what the games make you feel hasn't been replicated by any other game.
author: Flammiedrum
